title: Bug 109718 - Put large content in text item, the tips shows the content in one line
description:
INTRODUCTION 32. SOME OF THE ERROR MESSAGE DOESN'T HAVE ENOUGH INFORMATION FOR USER TO IDENTIFY THE ERROR. 42.5 ADD JAVASCRIPT OBJECT 42.6 SUPPORT DROP IN THE GROUP HEADER 42.7 PROVIDE UNDOABLE TRANSACTION 42.8 USER PROPERTY REVISION 52.9 HELP GUI TO FILTRATE THE UNNECESSARY NOTIFICATIONS 53. ELEMENT EXTENSION 65. Save and put mouse on the text item

Expected Result: Tips show in given format
Actual Result: Tips show in one line
OB: When putting large content in a text item, the tips that should appear are displayed in a single line.
EB: The tips should be displayed in the expected format, matching the length and formatting of the content in the text item.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Put large content in a text item
2. Save the text item
3. Put the mouse on the text item to trigger the tips
